    def minimumOperations(self, nums: List[int], target: List[int]) -> int:
        ans=0
        last=0
        for i in range(len(nums)):
            t=target[i]-nums[i]
            if last>=0:
                if t>last:
                    ans+=t-last
                elif t<0:
                    ans+=-1*t
            else:
                if t<last:
                    ans+=(last-t)
                elif t>0:
                    ans+=t
            last=t
        return ans
